appDesc.message: A smart color picker & font detect tool

errorNoColors.message: No colors found on this page.

errorExtraction.message: Color extraction is not available for this page. Please try a different page or refresh this page.

defaultColorFormatTip.message: Choose the default format for displaying color values

eyeDropperNotSupported.message: EyeDropper API is not supported in your browser

deleteColorConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this color?

clearFontsConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to clear ALL SAVED fonts?

deleteFontConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete THIS font?

clearFontsSuccess.message: All fonts have been cleared successfully

feedbackTip.message: Your feedback helps us improve DesignPicker. We appreciate your time and suggestions.

surveyInvite.message: Help shape the future of DesignPicker by participating in our user survey.

colorTabDesc.message: Colors tab: View and manage colors on the page

fontTabDesc.message: Fonts tab: View and manage fonts on the page

categoryViewDesc.message: Category view: Display colors by category

unifiedViewDesc.message: Unified view: Display all colors in one page

defaultTabTip.message: Set the default tab to display when opening the extension

defaultColorLayoutTip.message: Choose the default layout style for the color display

errorConnection.message: Unable to connect to the page. Please refresh and try again.

errorPageUnavailable.message: Color extraction is not supported on this page. Please try another page.

errorNoColorsFound.message: No colors found on this page.

fontNotFound.message: No font found at selected position

clearHistoryConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to clear all color history?

emptyHistoryTip.message: No colors in history yet. Use the color picker to add colors.

fontPreviewText.message: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

pickingColorTip.message: Click to select any color on screen

exitFontDetector.message: Press ESC or DoubleClick to exit Font Detector
